mapper.select: select name, password, email, sex, active from users where User_ID = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into users (name, password, email, sex, active) values(#{name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{sex}, #{active})
mapper.update: update users set name = #{name}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, sex = #{sex}, active = #{active} where User_ID = #{id}
